title: Watch live: Russian cosmonauts begin 250th space station spacewalk
summary: Russian cosmonauts Oleg Artemyev and Denis Matveev ventured outside the International Space Station on Thursday for a planned six-and-a-half hour spacewalk to begin unlimbering the European Robotic Arm.

title: Northrop Grumman expects a $2 billion order from ULA for solid rocket boosters
summary: Northrop Grumman is anticipating a $2 billion contract from United Launch Alliance for solid rocket boosters, president and CEO Kathy Warden said April 28.

title: China’s Wenchang aims to become commercial space hub
summary: A southern city hosting China’s newest, transformative spaceport is pushing to become a hub for commercial and international space activity.

title: Inmarsat’s telemetry network for rockets ready for launch
summary: British satellite operator Inmarsat is preparing to use its telemetry relay network to support rocket launches this year for the first time, according to a company executive.

title: SpaceX director says six Crew Dragon launches per year is a sustainable goal
summary: A senior manager says that SpaceX could sustainably launch six or more Crew Dragons per year if the market for private missions...
